arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

params.sqlcmd: "select " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_NAME\\" as \\"PLANT_NAME\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"DRAW_CD\\" as \\"DRAW_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"SPEC\\" as \\"SPEC\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\" as \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" as \\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_SPOIL\\", 'FM99990.0999') as \\"ITEM_SPOIL\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\" as \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"LOT_SIZING_TYP\\" as \\"LOT_SIZING_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"MAX_PERIOD\\", 'FM999990') as \\"MAX_PERIOD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"MUL_ODR_QTY\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"MUL_ODR_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"MAX_ODR_QTY\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"MAX_ODR_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"MIN_ODR_QTY\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"MIN_ODR_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"SAFETY_STOCK\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"SAFETY_STOCK\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"ODR_LT\\", 'FM999990') as \\"ODR_LT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"FIXED_LT\\", 'FM999990') as \\"FIXED_LT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"PROP_LT\\", 'FM999990') as \\"PROP_LT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"SAFETY_LT\\", 'FM999990') as \\"SAFETY_LT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"PROP_LOT_SIZE\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"PROP_LOT_SIZE\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ISSUE_TYP\\" as \\"ISSUE_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"ISSUE_LT\\", 'FM999990') as \\"ISSUE_LT\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\" " +"from " +" M_PLANT, " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and(M_ITEM.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\" = 4 " +" or M_ITEM.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\" = 5)"

"select " +" TO_CHAR(SUM(T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY\\"), 'TM9') as \\"STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY\\" " +"from " +" T_ITEM_STOCK " +"where " +" T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"WH_CD\\" in ( " +" select " +" M_WH.\\"WH_CD\\" " +" from " +" M_WH " +" where " +" M_WH.\\"MRP_FLG\\" = 1 " +" )"
"select " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\" " +"from " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_ITEM.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\" IN (4, 5)"

"select " +" MIN(M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\") as \\"MIN_CAL_DATE\\", " +" MAX(M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\") as \\"MAX_CAL_DATE\\" " +"from " +" M_CAL " +"where " +" M_CAL.\\"CAL_NO\\" = ( " +" select " +" M_PLANT.\\"CAL_NO\\" as \\"CAL_NO\\" " +" from " +" M_PLANT " +" where " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" )"

"select " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"DRAW_CD\\" as \\"DRAW_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"SPEC\\" as \\"SPEC\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\" as \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" as \\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_SPOIL\\", 'FM99990.0999') as \\"ITEM_SPOIL\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\" as \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"LOT_SIZING_TYP\\" as \\"LOT_SIZING_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"MAX_PERIOD\\", 'FM999990') as \\"MAX_PERIOD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"MUL_ODR_QTY\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"MUL_ODR_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"MAX_ODR_QTY\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"MAX_ODR_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"MIN_ODR_QTY\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"MIN_ODR_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"SAFETY_STOCK\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"SAFETY_STOCK\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"ODR_LT\\", 'FM999990') as \\"ODR_LT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"FIXED_LT\\", 'FM999990') as \\"FIXED_LT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"PROP_LT\\", 'FM999990') as \\"PROP_LT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"SAFETY_LT\\", 'FM999990') as \\"SAFETY_LT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"PROP_LOT_SIZE\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"PROP_LOT_SIZE\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ISSUE_TYP\\" as \\"ISSUE_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"ISSUE_LT\\", 'FM999990') as \\"ISSUE_LT\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\" " +"from " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" MIN(M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\") as \\"MIN_CAL_DATE\\", " +" MAX(M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\") as \\"MAX_CAL_DATE\\" " +"from " +" M_CAL " +"where " +" M_CAL.\\"CAL_NO\\" = ( " +" select " +" M_ITEM.\\"CAL_NO\\" as \\"CAL_NO\\" " +" from " +" M_ITEM " +" where " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" )"

cell.name: MRP_ODR_NAME
cell.description: 品目手配区分 表示文字列

cell.name: OUTSIDE_NAME
cell.description: 品目内外作区分 表示文字列

cell.name: UNIT_QTY_NAME
cell.description: 在庫数量単位区分 表示文字列

cell.name: LOT_SIZING_NAME
cell.description: ロットまとめ区分 表示文字列

cell.name: STOCK_UNIT_1
cell.description: 最大手配数単位(まるめ数量 単位のコピー)

cell.name: STOCK_UNIT_2
cell.description: 最小手配数単位(まるめ数量 単位のコピー)

cell.name: STOCK_UNIT_3
cell.description: 安全在庫量単位(まるめ数量 単位のコピー)

cell.name: STOCK_UNIT_4
cell.description: 手持在庫数単位(まるめ数量 単位のコピー)
